attributes.action: Make sure people get help through this lockdown extra benefit payments to cope
attributes.additional_details:
I think the government through their own mistakes have made this second lockdown necessary 
So I don't feel that we should be made to okay again the government should take a payout cause they messed up so bad
attributes.background:
Help for benefit claimant's 
Full wage for people unable to work 
Proper sick pay 
Rent holiday even for private tenants on benefits

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for all the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for private rents. 

We've already got a petition calling for full sick pay for people unable to work. You can find out more here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551962

You could start a petition calling for an increase to benefit payments, if that's still something you'd like to see happen.
